title: {{tunnel}} Tier2 URL events at {{ikeProbeDetailTimestamp:call('time_convert')}}
description:
Table gives IKE Tunnel Tier2 events for the timestamp clicked in Probe Events detail table.

Green => URL is reachable.
Red => URL is unreachable
Gray => URL has not been probed in the 30 secs interval
author: Bharat Mukheja
